about.title: About Us
about.description: Our company specializes in IT and AI services, with particular expertise in custom solution development, data exploitation, and decision-maker training.

paragraphs.p1: We stand out through our pragmatic approach and our ability to translate complex technical concepts into concrete and accessible solutions.
paragraphs.p2: Our mission is to support you in your digital transformation by providing the tools, knowledge, and expertise needed to succeed in an ever-evolving world.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for excellence in every project, applying best practices and staying at the forefront of innovation.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We believe in the power of collaboration and work closely with our clients to achieve their goals.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly explore new technologies and approaches to deliver innovative solutions to our clients.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about our services

q1.question: How do we start working together?
q1.reponse: The first step is to contact us for an initial meeting where we'll discuss your needs and objectives. We'll then propose a personalized approach and a detailed quote.

q2.question: What types of companies do you work with?
q2.reponse: We work with companies of all sizes, from startups to large corporations, across various sectors. Our approach is tailored to each client's specific needs.

q3.question: How much do your services cost?
q3.reponse: Our rates vary depending on the nature and scope of the project. We offer solutions adapted to different budgets and work with complete transparency on costs.

q4.question: What is your approach to confidentiality?
q4.reponse: We place paramount importance on confidentiality. All our contracts include strict confidentiality clauses, and we implement robust security measures to protect your data.

q5.question: Do you provide support after project completion?
q5.reponse: Absolutely! We offer maintenance and support services to ensure the longevity and evolution of your solutions. We remain available to support you in the long term.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What our clients say about our training

items.content: To manage large-scale events, we strengthened our IT infrastructure with a DevOps approach. The technical support helped us optimize resource management, automate processes, and ensure service continuity, while reducing risks and improving responsiveness.
items.author: Julien Cugniez

items.content: Thanks to the training provided by FOXON CONSULTING, I was able to better understand and leverage AI in my IT/finance profession. The tools and methods taught allowed me to automate tasks, optimize my analyses, and improve my productivity. A clear, concrete, and essential training for gaining efficiency!
items.author: Pierre Croissant

items.content: The FOXON team provided me with personalized training on IT project management and DevOps development. The trainer showed great listening skills, understood my needs, and demonstrated real pedagogy in transmitting their teachings. The information and educational materials received are now useful to me daily and allow me to be more effective in my various projects.
items.author: Guillaume D.

items.question: Do I need prior technical knowledge?
items.reponse: No, our training programs are specifically designed for decision makers without technical background. We make complex concepts accessible using clear language and concrete examples.

items.question: Can the training be customized?
items.reponse: Absolutely! We adapt the content of our training to your industry, specific challenges, and strategic objectives. Contact us to discuss your particular needs.

items.question: Do you offer in-house training?
items.reponse: Yes, we offer in-house training, which allows us to adapt the content to your specific context and train multiple employees simultaneously. This is often the most effective solution for management teams.

items.question: What is the ideal number of participants?
items.reponse: To ensure an optimal learning experience and promote interactions, we recommend groups of 5 to 10 participants. This allows everyone to benefit from personalized attention while taking advantage of rich exchanges.

items.question: Is there follow-up after the training?
items.reponse: Yes, we offer post-training support that includes Q&A sessions, additional resources, and access to our experts to help you put the acquired knowledge into practice.

cta.title: Ready to Train Your Teams?
cta.description: Contact us to discuss your specific needs and discover how our training can transform your approach to AI and automation.
